verses.verse: O Lord <WH3068>, you are my God <WH430>; I will exalt <WH7311> you <WH3034>, I will praise your name <WH8034>; for you have done <WH6213> wonderful <WH6382> things <WH6098>; your counsels of old <WH7350> are faithfulness <WH530> and truth <WH544>.

For you have made <WH7760> of a city <WH5892> a heap <WH1530>; of a fortified <WH1219> city <WH7151> a ruin <WH4654>: a palace <WH759> of strangers <WH2114> to be no city <WH5892>; it shall never <WH5769> be built <WH1129>.
Therefore shall the strong <WH5794> people <WH5971> glorify <WH3513> you <WH7151>, the city of the terrible <WH6184> nations <WH1471> shall fear you <WH3372>.

For you have been a strength <WH4581> to the poor <WH1800>, a strength <WH4581> to the needy <WH34> in his distress <WH6862>, a refuge <WH4268> from the storm <WH2230>, a shadow <WH6738> from the heat <WH2721>, when the blast <WH7307> of the terrible ones <WH6184> is as a storm <WH2230> against the wall <WH7023>.

You shall bring down <WH3665> the noise <WH7588> of strangers <WH2114>, as the heat <WH2721> in a dry place <WH6724>; even the heat <WH2721> with the shadow <WH6738> of a cloud <WH5645>: the branch <WH2159> of the terrible ones <WH6184> shall be brought low <WH6030>.

And in this mountain <WH2022> shall the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> make <WH6213> unto all people <WH5971> a feast <WH4960> of fat things <WH8081>, a feast <WH4960> of wines on the lees <WH8105>, of fat things <WH8081> full of marrow <WH4229>, of wines on the lees <WH8105> well refined <WH2212>.

And he will destroy <WH1104> in this mountain <WH2022> the face <WH6440> of the covering <WH3875> cast over <WH3874> all people <WH5971>, and the veil <WH4541> that is spread <WH5259> over all nations <WH1471>.

He will swallow up <WH1104> death <WH4194> in victory <WH5331>; and the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069> will wipe away <WH4229> tears <WH1832> from off all faces <WH6440>; and the rebuke <WH2781> of his people <WH5971> shall he take away <WH5493> from off all the earth <WH776>: for the Lord <WH3068> has spoken it <WH1696>.

And it shall be said <WH559> in that day <WH3117>, Behold <WH430>, this is our God; we have waited <WH6960> for him <WH3467>, and he will save us <WH3068>: this is the Lord; we have waited <WH6960> for him <WH1523>, we will be glad and rejoice <WH8055> in his salvation <WH3444>.

For in this mountain <WH2022> shall the hand <WH3027> of the Lord <WH3068> rest <WH5117>, and Moab <WH4124> shall be trodden down <WH1758> under him <WH4963>, even as straw is trodden down <WH1758> for the dunghill <WH4087>.

And he shall spread forth <WH6566> his hands <WH3027> in the midst <WH7130> of them <WH7811>, as he that swims spreads forth <WH6566> his hands to swim <WH7811>: and he shall bring down <WH8213> their pride <WH1346> together with the spoils <WH698> of their hands <WH3027>.
And the fortress <WH4013> of the high fort <WH4869> of your walls <WH2346> shall he bring down <WH7817>, lay low <WH8213>, and bring <WH5060> to the ground <WH776>, even to the dust <WH6083>.
